judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The decree of the Orphans’ Court of Philadelphia County is affirmed on the opinion of President Judge Van D.usen on the exceptions to the adjudication; costs to be paid by the appellant.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Ulysses 8. Koons filed a brief as amicus curiae,
casebody.head_matter:
Craig Estate.
Argued April 17, 1947.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
Edward F. Hitchcock, for appellant.
R. M. Remick, for appellee.
Ulysses 8. Koons filed a brief as amicus curiae,
May 7, 1947:
